history.proof: intros a a0 A1' H1 H2. unfold plusTerm. sauto depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros a a0 A1 H1 H2.

ctx: intros a a0 A1' H1 H2.

ctx: intros a a0 A1' H1 H2.
